title: Ougon Bat
opening_song: "Ougon Bat (黄金バット)" by Vocal Shop
ending_song: "Ougon Bat Kazoe Uta (黄金バット数え歌)" by Columbia Yurikago Kai, Yasushi Suzuki
sinopse: A golden warrior wearing a cape and a scepter, Ougon Bat was a protector spirit from Atlantis reanimated by a scientist and his friends (specially the sweet Marie) from his tomb covered in hieroglyphics. His entry was heralded by a golden bat and a sinister laugh and he would put good use of his super powers to combat the evil forces of Dr. Zero.
